name: com.acegikmo.shapes
description:
A real-time vector graphics library for Unity to draw Lines, Polylines, Discs, Arcs, Rectangles, Spheres, Tori, and other primitives both as easy-to-use components, and with an immediate-mode API for code-based procedural drawing. Shapes supports drawing both at runtime as well as for debugging purposes in OnDrawGizmos!
